mapper.update: update BUS_HAIRSTYLE set styletitle = #{styletitle}, content = #{content}, userid = #{userid}, publishtime = #{publishtime}, viewcount = #{viewcount}, srcImagePath = #{srcImagePath}, id= id where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select a.styletitle, a.content, a.userid, a.publishtime, a.viewcount, a.srcImagePath, a.id from BUS_HAIRSTYLE a where a.id= #{id}
